entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Port aux Basques area. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
